name: Cold Survivor
description:
Welcome to Cold Survivor!

Controls:

  • Use Oculus Controllers to move hands around
  • Point and Click movement [Teleporting to a Location] (Current Unavailable)

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 This is a VR game made by Analisse, Chan, Daniel and Sharon.

Team Roles:

  • Analisse --> Main Coder
  • Chan --> Sounds/Music
  • Daniel --> All 3D Assets
  • Sharon --> Producer
